name: Glide Zone
description:
A 2D platformer designed for the "Make a Platformer" Game Jam. Guide your Corgi through the using using your grocery bag glider!

This was my first time using Corgi Engine and I loved it! The game was designed over a period of 5 days, with my getting use to the engine. I'm hoping to add more levels in the future and be more thoughtful with level design.
